product.title: 0.78in-1.4in Hair Curling Conical Barrel for Dyson Airwrap Attachments, 20-36mm Conical Curling Barrels for Dyson Airwrap Styler HS01 HS05, 2 in 1 Automatic Hair Curling Barrel Attachment, Gold
product.description: Feature: Brand new and high quality Made of premium material for and practical use 0.8-1.4Inch/ 20-36mm Hair Curling Conical Barrel for Dyson Airwrap Attachments, 2 in 1 Automatic Hair Curling Barrels for Dyson Airwrap HS01 HS05 The unique conical design helps create natural curls, tightened from root to tip, the curling bucket automatically curls with strong adsorption, flexible and lightweight design allows you to create a lot of curls easily. The curling barrel has two wind directions, and both sides can be rolled in and out to achieve symmetrical curl beauty. Hair Curler is easy to install and remov With unique conical barrel design for longer hair, 20-36mm allows you to easily achieve fast and efficient styling, providing versatility for all hair types Packaging Contents: 1* Hair curling conical barrel Note: 1, The real color of the item may be slightly different from the pictures shown on website caused by many factors such as brightness of your monitor and light brightness 2, Please allow slight manual measurement deviation for the data
product.description_html:
Feature:
 
 Brand new and high quality
 
 Made of premium material for and practical use
 
 0.8-1.4Inch/ 20-36mm Hair Curling Conical Barrel for Dyson Airwrap Attachments, 2 in 1 Automatic Hair Curling Barrels for Dyson Airwrap HS01 HS05
 
 The unique conical design helps create natural curls, tightened from root to tip, the curling bucket automatically curls with strong adsorption, flexible and lightweight design allows you to create a lot of curls easily.
 
 The curling barrel has two wind directions, and both sides can be rolled in and out to achieve symmetrical curl beauty. Hair Curler is easy to install and remov
 
 With unique conical barrel design for longer hair, 20-36mm allows you to easily achieve fast and efficient styling, providing versatility for all hair types
 
 
 Packaging Contents:
 1* Hair curling conical barrel
 
 
 Note:
 1, The real color of the item may be slightly different from the pictures shown on website caused by many factors such as brightness of your monitor and light brightness

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
